meanings.definition: A groove or channel in a cylindrical object, typically used for decoration or to provide a better grip.
meanings.sent1: The cannelure on the metal pipe added a nice touch to its design.
meanings.sent2: The cannelure on the handle of the sword helped the warrior hold it firmly.
meanings.sent3: The cannelure on the pencil made it look like a tiny race track.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was as smooth as a cannelure in a well-crafted vase.
meanings.sent5: The cannelure on the glass bottle caught the light, making it sparkle.
